radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Computed Tomography (CT) scan of the neck and chest
radiographic_examinations.findings: Lymph nodes up to 9 mm in diameter at multiple cervical locations; mediastinal and hilar lymph nodes measuring 9 mm; bilateral axillary lymph nodes up to 10 mm; small anterior pericardial effusion; soft-tissue nodule 4 mm in diameter in the left lower lobe; mild centrilobular emphysema; occasional subcentimeter cystic lucencies.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT scan of the abdomen and pelvis
radiographic_examinations.findings: Splenomegaly measuring 16.5 cm; cystic structure in the interpolar region of the right kidney; no evidence of lymphadenopathy in the abdomen or pelvis.
